content: The sizes are shown for the Retina displays. For the displays with standard resolutions the logo width and height will be resized accordingly upon upload.

comment.text: The WhiteLabelTooltip translation key is used to provide a tooltip explaining how logo sizes are resized on standard resolutions displays. It appears in the settings section of the WhiteLabelHeader component and helps inform users about upload requirements.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "سيتم تغيير حجم عرض الشعار وارتفاعه" is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would focus on the resizing action itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم تعديل حجم عرض الشعار وارتفاعه

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'عرض' (display) is redundant when referring to the logo's width.  It's implied they're talking about the logo's dimensions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم تعديل حجم الشعار وارتفاعه

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "The sizes are shown for the Retina displays" is not accurately translated. While "Retina displeylər üçün göstərilən ölçülər" is understandable, a more natural and accurate translation would be something like "Retina ekranlar üçün ölçülər göstərilir" or "Bu ölçülər Retina ekranlar üçün göstərilir".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu ölçülər Retina ekranlar üçün göstərilir

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "For the displays with standard resolutions" isn't perfectly translated. "Standart ekranlar üçün" is acceptable but lacks flow. A better option would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Standart yüksəkliyi olan ekranlar üçün

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "will be resized accordingly upon upload" is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it doesn't flow as well. A more natural translation would be "yükləyəndə avtomatik olaraq dəyişdiriləcək".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: yükləyəndə avtomatik olaraq dəyişdiriləcək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "θα αλλάξουν ανάλογα το μέγεθος" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey "will be resized accordingly". It suggests they will change based on the size itself, not as a proportionate change.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: θα αναδιασταθούν ανάλογα κατά τη μεταφόρτωση

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a little clunky. It could flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Για τις οθόνες με τυπικές αναλύσεις, το πλάτος και το ύψος του λογότυπου θα αναδιασταθούν κατά τη μεταφόρτωση.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Retinanäytöille" lacks a space after the period. While common in Finnish, it's better to include it for readability and consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koot näytetään Retinanäytöille.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "muutetaan vastaavasti latauksen yhteydessä" is a bit clunky. A more natural Finnish phrasing would be 'muutetaan automaattisesti' or 'säädetään automaattisesti'. 'Yhteydessä' isn't the most accurate representation of 'upon upload'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koot näytetään Retinanäytöille. Logon leveys ja korkeus vakioresoluution näytöille säädetään automaattisesti latauksen yhteydessä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "resized accordingly" is not accurately conveyed by "համապատասխանաբար կչափափոխվեն". A better translation would emphasize the automatic resizing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Համապատասխանաբար լայնությունը և բարձրությունը ավտոմատ կերպով կփոփոխվեն վերբեռնումից հետո:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing is a bit clunky. Consider improving the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ստանդարտ լուծումներով էկրանների համար պատկերանշանի լայնությունը և բարձրությունը վերբեռնումից հետո ավտոմատ կերպով կփոփոխվեն:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'resized accordingly upon upload' is a bit clunky. A more natural Italian equivalent would be 'ridimensionate automaticamente durante il caricamento' or 'ridimensionate in automatico al caricamento'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ridimensionate automaticamente durante il caricamento

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "resized accordingly upon upload" is not the most natural translation of "resized accordingly upon upload." A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'アップロード時に自動的にリサイズされます (appuro-do shi ni jidou-teki ni ri-sai saremasu)' which emphasizes the automatic resizing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: アップロード時に自動的にリサイズされます (appuro-do shi ni jidou-teki ni ri-sai saremasu)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and could be broken up for better readability in Japanese. It might be more user-friendly to separate the information about Retina displays and standard resolutions into two sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: サイズはRetinaディスプレイ用に表示されています。標準的な解像度のディスプレイの場合、ロゴの幅と高さはアップロード時に自動的にリサイズされます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "그에 따라 크기가 조정됩니다" (geu-e da-ra keu-gi-ga jo-jeong-doep-ni-da) is a bit awkward and doesn't flow naturally in Korean. A more natural phrasing would be "자동으로 조정됩니다" (jadong-eu-ro jo-jeong-doep-ni-da) or "자동으로 비율이 조정됩니다" (jadong-eu-ro bi-ryul-i jo-jeong-doep-ni-da).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 자동으로 조정됩니다 or 자동으로 비율이 조정됩니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ໂຫລດ' is a common misspelling of 'ໂຫລດ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໂຫລດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "will be resized accordingly upon upload" is a bit awkward in Latvian. "Atbilstoši mainīti" implies a simple change, but the English suggests a dynamic resizing based on the display's resolution. A more accurate translation would convey this dynamic adjustment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izmēri tiks automātiski pielāgoti standarta izšķirtspējas displejiem augšupielādes laikā.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure could be improved for better flow and readability in Latvian. Combining the last part into the first sentence might enhance clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izmēri ir parādīti Retina displejiem, un standarta izšķirtspējas displejiem tie tiks automātiski pielāgoti augšupielādes laikā.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'wyświetlaczy' is potentially ambiguous and could be more clearly stated. While technically correct, it could be interpreted as 'displays' in a general sense instead of 'Retina displays' and 'standard resolution displays'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rozmiary są wyświetlane dla ekranów Retina. W przypadku ekranów o standardowych rozdzielczościach...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the sentence structure is acceptable, the repetition of 'wyświetlaczy' can feel slightly clunky. Consider rephrasing for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rozmiary są wyświetlane dla ekranów Retina. Dla ekranów o standardowych rozdzielczościach...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “mostradores da Retina” is an awkward translation of "Retina displays." It literally translates to 'Retina dials' which doesn't convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Os tamanhos são mostrados para telas Retina.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “em conformidade” is a slightly formal and less natural way to say “accordingly” in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: apropriadamente

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “no momento do carregamento do ficheiro” is a bit verbose and indirect. A more concise and natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ao fazer o upload

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'scalează' (scales) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'resized'. 'Resized' implies a calculated adjustment, whereas 'scales' suggests a simple enlargement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The best option would be 'vor fi redimensionate' which directly translates to 'will be resized'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a critical error, using a more formal phrasing might be appropriate for a settings tooltip. 'la încărcare' is a bit colloquial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'la momentul încărcării' (at the moment of upload) for a more polished feel, though this is subjective.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'sizes are shown' is not accurately translated. 'ප්‍රමාණ පෙන්වයි' is a bit awkward. A more natural translation would be something like 'ප්‍රමාණම් දක්වයි' or 'ප්‍රමාණම් දැක්වේ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ප්‍රමාණම් දක්වයි or ප්‍රමාණම් දැක්වේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'standard resolutions' is translated as 'සම්මත විභේදන'. While technically correct, 'සාමාන්‍ය විභේදනය' might be more readily understood by a wider audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සාමාන්‍ය විභේදනය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'resized accordingly' is translated as 'ඊට අනුරූපව යළි ප්‍රමාණනය කෙරේ'.  'යළි ප්‍රමාණනය කෙරේ' can be simplified to 'ප්‍රමාණනය කෙරේ' as the 're-' is redundant in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ප්‍රමාණනය කෙරේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'upload' is translated as 'načítaní', which more accurately means 'loading' or 'uploading'. While related, 'upload' conveys the specific action of sending a file. Using 'nahraní' would be a more precise translation of 'upload'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rozmery sú pre Retina obrazovky. Pri obrazovkách so štandardným rozlíšením sa šírka a výška loga prispôsobí pri nahraní.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Pri zaslonih s standardno ločljivostjo bosta širina in višina logotipa ustrezno spremenjeni ob nalaganju' could be improved for better flow. While grammatically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pri zaslonih s standardno ločljivostjo se širina in višina logotipa ustrezno prilagodita ob nalaganju.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "The sizes are shown" is awkward. A more natural translation would be "Величина је приказана" (singular) or "Величине су приказане" (plural) if referring to multiple sizes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Величина је приказана за Retina екране.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "аутоматски" (automatically) isn't quite accurate. While resizing happens automatically, the English phrasing implies the resizing *will* occur, not necessarily that it's automatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ширина и висина логотипа биће прилагођене приликом отпремања.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Missing punctuation. A period should follow "екране" (screens) in the first sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Величина је приказана за Retina екране.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'resized accordingly' is not directly translated. 'Automatski prilagođene' is a good approximation, but 'prilagođene' could be more precise, implying a deliberate adjustment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Veličine su prikazane za Retina ekrane. Za ekrane sa standardnim rezolucijama, širina i visina logotipa će biti automatski prilagođene/skalirane prilikom otpremanja.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'uygun şekilde' is a bit awkward in this context. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: uygun oranda or otomatik olarak

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'upload' is translated as 'передавання'. While technically correct, 'завантаження' would be a more natural and commonly used term for 'upload' in a technical context within Ukrainian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Розміри вказані для дисплеїв Retina. Для дисплеїв зі стандартною роздільною здатністю ширина та висота логотипа будуть відповідно змінені після завантаження.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "resized accordingly" is not accurately translated. "Thay đổi kích thước tương ứng" implies a specific resizing formula, while the original means it will be adjusted proportionally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Các kích thước logo sẽ được điều chỉnh tương ứng khi tải lên.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "The sizes are shown for the Retina displays" is not accurately translated. A more natural translation would convey that the sizes *provided* are for Retina displays.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 该尺寸适用于 Retina 屏幕。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "For the displays with standard resolutions the logo width and height will be resized accordingly upon upload" is a bit clunky in Chinese. It could be more concise and clearer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 对于标准分辨率的显示器，上传时徽标的宽度和高度将自动调整。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a major issue, a full stop/period (。or .) should be added at the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 对于标准分辨率的显示器，上传时徽标的宽度和高度将自动调整。
